content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 1, Juventus 3.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 1, Juventus 3.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.
Goal!  Real Madrid 1, Juventus 3. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
Substitution, Juventus. Wojciech Szczesny replaces Gonzalo Higuaín.
Gianluigi Buffon (Juventus) is shown the red card.
Penalty conceded by Medhi Benatia (Juventus) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Real Madrid. Lucas Vázquez draws a foul in the penalty area.
Medhi Benatia (Juventus) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Medhi Benatia (Juventus).
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Foul by Jesús Vallejo (Real Madrid).
Gonzalo Higuaín (Juventus) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
